content.question: Which of the following best describes a similarity between the arguments made by Rossinow and Berman in the excerpts?

choices.label: Votersâ€™ increased approval for liberal programs changed Republican tactics.
Debates over foreign policy caused a split within the Democratic Party.
Conservatism had a widespread impact beyond the election of Reagan.
A defiant Soviet Union tested the strength of the United States military.

content.answer: Conservatism had a widespread impact beyond the election of Reagan.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
